meanings.definition: A building or structure housing pumps.
meanings.sent1: The pumphouse in the park keeps the fountain running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The workers gathered at the pumphouse to fix the broken pump.
meanings.sent3: The pumphouse had a party for all the pumps, and they danced all night!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a pumphouse, pumping love to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The old pumphouse creaked and groaned as it worked tirelessly.

meanings.sent1: The pumphouse by the river supplied water to the entire village.
meanings.sent2: The pumphouse was painted blue to match the clear water it pumped.
meanings.sent3: The ducks thought the pumphouse was a new pond and tried to swim in it!
meanings.sent4: His words flowed out of him like water from a pumphouse.
meanings.sent5: The pumphouse hummed with activity as it sent water to the fields.
